TEEMA Solutions Group Inc. (TEEMA) is focused in providing both project and staffing solutions to organizational challenges. Over the past 10 years, our success in the staffing industry has allowed us a ‘seat at the table’ with influential consultants and clients who have confided in us that our industry-leading staffing service is an important first step to a greater challenge: project delivery. TEEMA’s service offerings complete an end-to-end managed solution for our clients from staffing to project delivery. Now what once started as simply finding resources for key clients, TEEMA has evolved over time with our clients. We recognize that companies today are looking for options, looking for flexibility and looking for the right service to fulfill their needs and TEEMA has answered this call. TEEMA Solutions Group is a consortium of senior technology professionals from various specializations that have teamed up to provide full scale services in key areas. You’ll see from our practice areas those specialties we focus on. Whether you need expertise in SAP, Oracle, Web Services, IT Infrastructure & Security Architecture, IT Health Informatics, Project Staffing or Change Management, you’ll find our Practice Leads experienced in their respective disciplines

One of two IT consulting firms awarded an international professional services contract with Northrop GrummanNorthrop GrummanQwest CommunicationsAT&TCorporate ExpressNORTHROP GRUMMAN PROFESSIONAL SERVICES AGREEMENT WITH TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS PRIMARY VENDORThrough this agreement, Northrop Grumman personnellocated at any domestic or international location can obtain IT professional services, such astemporary, contract and fulltime staffing, at pre-negotiated rates.In addition to offering substantial discounts to Northrop Grumman, these agreements will assist the company in meeting its objectives to support small, and minority- owned businesses. As a government contractor, Northrop Grumman Corporation has aggressive goals to support small businesses, and INCAT and Technology Solutions each fall into those target areas. INCAT is classified as a small business, and Technology Solutions meets the criteria for a “Small, Woman-Owned Business.”Among the other benefits that will be derived from these new agreements are:Improved management of professional service orders by the supplier through a more streamlined hiring process;Enhanced support for Northrop Grumman’s e-Procurement initiative by enabling on-line contact with the new suppliers.
